name: Daal Tadka (Tempered Lentil Soup)
description: A simple and delicious Daal Tadka (Indian lentil soup side dish). Easy to make and healthy. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the daal in warm water for half an hour
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the daal in warm water for half an hour

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat the oil on medium heat until its nice an hot.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, heat the oil on medium heat until its nice an hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard seeds and after a few seconds of sputtering, add cumin and coriander seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard seeds and after a few seconds of sputtering, add cumin and coriander seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asofetida(hing) and curry leaves and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asofetida(hing) and curry leaves and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the red chili and garlic and cook till garlic is golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the red chili and garlic and cook till garlic is golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in tomatoes and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in tomatoes and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the soaked daal and add it to the pan with the water, salt and turmeric.
recipeInstructions.name: Rinse the soaked daal and add it to the pan with the water, salt and turmeric.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well. Cook covered for 10-15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well. Cook covered for 10-15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the butter and take off heat!
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the butter and take off heat!

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot garnished with cilantro and lime wedges !. The Daal goes well with basmati rice or as a side dish with Roti and and any dry vegetable stir fry.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot garnished with cilantro and lime wedges !. The Daal goes well with basmati rice or as a side dish with Roti and and any dry vegetable stir fry.

keywords: healthy indian dish, lentil soup, vegan daal
